components: STEERING,SUSPENSION,SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,VISIBILITY,EQUIPMENT
summary: THE CONSUMER EXPERIENCED THE FOLLOWING:  BOTH HALVES OF THE A/C HAS BEEN BROKEN SEVERAL TIMES/COMPRESSER & EVAPORATIVE) ALL FOUR SPRINGS HAVE BEEN BROKEN, CHECK ENGINE LIGHT, REPAIR THERMOSTAT(INOP), THE PROP SHAFT SEAL AND REAR DIFFERENTIAL AXLE SEALS HAVE GONE, THE SUSPENSION TIE ROD ENDS LOOSE-NEED TO BE REPLACED, BRAKE ROTOR'S, PASSENGER SIDE REAR SPRING(SQUEAKS), REAR BRAKES, SERPENTINE BELT, RECALL IGNITION SWITCH, MIL LIGHT ON, FAULTY ECT SENSOR, 6-8 CONTROL ARMS LOOSE, FRONT SPRINGS (BROKEN), REAR WINDOW INOP, AND THE CLIMATE CONTROL IS NOISY.  SCC
